dmca.title: Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
NC

 

-----Original Message-----
From: support@gofeed.com [mailto:support@gofeed.com] 
Sent: Monday, February 07, 2005 3:58 PM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright Infringement

 

Hello

I am writing in to inform you that a website you are hosting is infringing
on copyrights of my website

The website in question that you host is:

http://www.gofeed.INFO

my website is:

http://www.gofeed.com

 

This person hotlinked to all my images if you look closely at the source
code all images and even my banner rotator are still linked to gofeed.COM

He also included my business name when he copied this information At the
bottom of the page it reads "A Division Of Gouda Enterprises" which is my
registered copany name here in Oklahoma.

 

I trust you will investigate this and shut this website down untill this
person changes the entire site design

 

If you need to contact me via phone:580-255-8066

 

Thanks

Suzanne Vieira
